creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: massive hollow torque (nearly identical to 2007.17.384) in two sections with hinge and lock; lower section major motifs from proper right to proper left include: lion, dragon, and phoenix; secondary motifs include floral and foliate motifs and fish-like creatures; upper section has floral and foliate designs; outer edges scalloped; inner band of dots around outer and inner edges; all motifs are in relief
title: Torque
